item.title: Flask on Nginx and Gunicorn
item.description: Even after deploying a number of Flask apps I always find myself googling up blog posts on how to get the trio of nginx, gunicorn and supervisor working together. Below is simple, straight, no-nonsense guide on how to deploy a flask app on a Linux server using Nginx, Gunicorn and Supervisor. A disclaimer: this guide will not tell you what these technologies are. Specifically, I will not talk about why you should use nginx + gunicorn instead of apache + mod_wsgi.
